snippet: With a Republican newly elected as governor and a Republican-controlled legislature, North Carolina will soon have its most conservative government in a century.
abstract: North Carolina, having elected Republican governor and Republican-controlled legislature, will soon have its most conservative government in a century; consolidation of power will likely cause ideological shift in long-moderate state that could be felt for decades.
lead_paragraph: With a Republican newly elected as governor and a Republican-controlled legislature, North Carolina will soon have its most conservative government in a century.

headline.seo: G.O.P. to Take Control in Long-Moderate North Carolina
headline.main: G.O.P.’s Full Control in Long-Moderate North Carolina May Leave Lasting Stamp
headline.print_headline: G.O.P.’s Full Control in Long-Moderate North Carolina May Leave Lasting Stamp
